repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript contains two texts namely Pauṣadhilakṣaṇa by Devabhaṭṭa and Saptapadasārthakyavicāra. The first text is a small text on the the description of the defination of Pauṣa from the taddhita chapter of the Vyutpattipāda of Gadādhara. On 1v vyut kro is written in the left margin. Kro is written in the Devanagari script. Palm leaf is used as guard. Number 55 in pink chalk and a sticker with same number printed and also in blue pencil number 82 written on the sticker.
The secod text is Saptapadasārthakyavicāra which is Nyāya text. The information about the author is not known. Both texts are separately numbered.

msItem.title: Pauṣadhilakṣaṇa
msItem.author: Devabhaṭṭa śarmā
msItem.incipit: (Pauṣa 1v 1) brahmavidadvaidānandasarasvatya?yati maheśān . surisamanvita(vā)vedānta? thiguru san devabhaṭṭaśarmāsa??vyutpattipāde taddhitapra (Pauṣa 1v 2) karaṇe pauṣādyamāsavicāre śulapāṇimate pauṣādimāsānāṃ lakṣaṇadvayaṃ pradarśitaṃ tatra lāghavaguṇaśāliprathamalakṣaṇe naiva vya (Pauṣa 1v 3) vahārādisiddhau gauravādidoṣāviśiṣṭadvitīyalakṣaṇakaraṇasya kiṃ prayojanaṃ
msItem.explicit: (Pauṣa 17r 1) dhikaraṇasamayāvyavahita ya?rām parasya vijānīyapakṣadvayātmakaṃ prami?dāntasamudāyatvamityevaṃ lakṣaṇandraṣṭavyamiti kṛtamativistareṇeti dik ..
msItem.finalRubric: (Pauṣa 17r 1) pauṣādelakṣaṇamidaṃ (Pauṣa 17r 2) yathāmati vivecitaṃ prīṇatāntena vidvāṃsaḥ santuṣyāt sa maheśvaraḥ … harih oṃ śrīgaṇeśāyanamaḥ

msItem.title: Saptapadasārthakyavicāraḥ
msItem.explicit: (saptapad 5r 5) saptapadārthāntarbhutasya dhīya(3 letters illegible) protāndṛśasīmāntavyākopaprasaṃga (2 letters illegible) niruktavyāptiniścayasyāvaśyaktvena ta (saptapad 5r 6) darthaṃ

extent.measure: 21 folio together two texts. 1 guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin . 17r is not numbered and 5r is also not numbered. Pauṣa 1v-17r. Saptapada- 1v-5r.
supportDesc.condition: broken at two margins rest is good state of preservation.

handNote.desc: Two texts are written by diffrent person. The first text has small and neat hand writin whereas the second texts has spreaded and faint characters.

additions.desc: On 1v number 55 is over written in roman in blue pen on number 36 which is written in pink pen.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separare words. Question marks are used to show unclear letter or words.

TEI.text:
(Pauṣa 1v 1) śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ brahmavidadvaidānandasarasvatya?yati maheśān . surisamanvita(vā)vedānta? thiguru san devabhaṭṭaśarmāsa??vyutpattipāde taddhitapra (Pauṣa 1v 2) karaṇe pauṣādyamāsavicāre śulapāṇimate pauṣādimāsānāṃ lakṣaṇadvayaṃ pradarśitaṃ tatra lāghavaguṇaśāliprathamalakṣaṇe naiva vya (Pauṣa 1v 3) vahārādisiddhau gauravādidoṣāviśiṣṭadvitīyalakṣaṇakaraṇasya kiṃ prayojanaṃ
(Pauṣa 17r 1) dhikaraṇasamayāvyavahita ya?rām parasya vijānīyapakṣadvayātmakaṃ prami?dāntasamudāyatvamityevaṃ lakṣaṇandraṣṭavyamiti kṛtamativistareṇeti dik .. pauṣādelakṣaṇamidaṃ (Pauṣa 17r 2) yathāmati vivecitaṃ prīṇatāntena vidvāṃsaḥ santuṣyāt sa maheśvaraḥ … harih oṃ śrīgaṇeśāyanamaḥ

(saptapada 1v 1) śrīgaṇeśāyanamaḥ dvandvasamāsasamabhivyāhṛtabahuvacanasya dvandvasamāsapadakapadārthaparyātpasaṃkhyābodhakatvamiti niyamaḥ . (saptapad 5r 5) saptapadārthāntarbhutasya dhīya(3 letters illegible) protāndṛśasīmāntavyākopaprasaṃga (2 letters illegible) niruktavyāptiniścayasyāvaśyaktvena ta (saptapad 5r 6) darthaṃ saptapadapadārthakamiti samāptaṃ śu. śrīrastu
